82514.text: Limit the body length of exec readiness/liveness probes. remote CRIs and Docker shim read a max of 16MB output of which the exec probe itself inspects 10kb.
82514.markdown: Limit the body length of exec readiness/liveness probes. remote CRIs and Docker shim read a max of 16MB output of which the exec probe itself inspects 10kb. ([#82514](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/82514), [@dims](https://github.com/dims))
82514.author: dims

82890.text: Update Azure load balancer to prevent orphaned public IP addresses
82890.markdown: Update Azure load balancer to prevent orphaned public IP addresses ([#82890](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/82890), [@chewong](https://github.com/chewong))
82890.author: chewong

83027.text: Fixes kube-proxy bug accessing self nodeip:port on windows
83027.markdown: Fixes kube-proxy bug accessing self nodeip:port on windows ([#83027](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/83027), [@liggitt](https://github.com/liggitt))
83027.author: liggitt

83102.text: Fix aggressive VM calls for Azure VMSS
83102.markdown: Fix aggressive VM calls for Azure VMSS ([#83102](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/83102), [@feiskyer](https://github.com/feiskyer))
83102.author: feiskyer

83184.text: Fix error where metrics related to dynamic kubelet config isn't registered
83184.markdown: Fix error where metrics related to dynamic kubelet config isn't registered ([#83184](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/83184), [@odinuge](https://github.com/odinuge))
83184.author: odinuge

83196.text: Use online nodes instead of possible nodes when discovering available NUMA nodes
83196.markdown: Use online nodes instead of possible nodes when discovering available NUMA nodes ([#83196](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/83196), [@zouyee](https://github.com/zouyee))
83196.author: zouyee

83261.text: Fixes a flaw (CVE-2019-11253) in json/yaml decoding where large or malformed documents could consume excessive server resources. Request bodies for normal API requests (create/delete/update/patch operations of regular resources) are now limited to 3MB.
83261.markdown: Fixes a flaw (CVE-2019-11253) in json/yaml decoding where large or malformed documents could consume excessive server resources. Request bodies for normal API requests (create/delete/update/patch operations of regular resources) are now limited to 3MB. ([#83261](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/83261), [@liggitt](https://github.com/liggitt))
83261.author: liggitt

83333.text: Fixes a goroutine leak in kube-apiserver when a request times out.
83333.markdown: Fixes a goroutine leak in kube-apiserver when a request times out. ([#83333](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/83333), [@lavalamp](https://github.com/lavalamp))
83333.author: lavalamp

83697.text: Fixed a bug in the single-numa-node policy of the TopologyManager.  Previously, pods that only requested CPU resources and did not request any third-party devices would fail to launch with a TopologyAffinity error. Now they will launch successfully.
83697.markdown: Fixed a bug in the single-numa-node policy of the TopologyManager.  Previously, pods that only requested CPU resources and did not request any third-party devices would fail to launch with a TopologyAffinity error. Now they will launch successfully. ([#83697](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/83697), [@klueska](https://github.com/klueska))
83697.author: klueska

83789.text: Fixed panic when accessing CustomResources of a CRD with x-kubernetes-int-or-string.
83789.markdown: Fixed panic when accessing CustomResources of a CRD with x-kubernetes-int-or-string. ([#83789](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/83789), [@sttts](https://github.com/sttts))
83789.author: sttts
